title: Senior HR Systems Manager
content:
Adjust, an AppLovin (NASDAQ: APP) company, is trusted by marketers around the world to measure and grow their apps across platforms, from mobile to CTV and beyond. Adjust works with companies at every stage of the app marketing journey, from fast-growing digital brands to brick-and-mortar companies launching their first apps. Adjust’s powerful measurement and analytics suite provides visibility, insights and essential tools that drive better results.
Our global team is composed of team members with life experiences, backgrounds, and perspectives that mirror our customers around the world. We seek outstanding candidates who demonstrate a commitment to diversity, equity, and inclusion through continuous learning and skill-building. We aim to support each other to ensure equitable and inclusive experiences, furthering our goal to create a culture of belonging that values the contributions of all team members.  
We're proud to have received several awards in Summer 2022, including G2's Easiest Setup, Easiest Admin, Leader, and Easiest To Do Business With. Our CPO was also honored with a Top Women in Media Award, and we were named the Best Overall Mobile Marketing Solution of 2022. These accolades are a testament to the excellence and innovation of our award-winning company.
 Get to know People & Places/ The Department
Our People & Places Department is the engine that fuels Adjust's success, enabling all departments to reach peak productivity! We're committed to crafting a great workplace, providing guidance, and streamlining operations across the board. Our goal? To cultivate a fantastic work environment, grow professionally together and champion global compliance.
 
Make an Impact/ The role:
As Senior HR Systems Manager you would be responsible for managing, maintaining and constantly improving our HR systems on a global level. We are using Workday as HRIS, and you will also supervise its integrations (from a business perspective) with other HR Systems, like Greenhouse and our intranet.
 
Empower Your Potential/ Responsibilities:  

Constantly review and improve the existing process landscape within the People team and with stakeholders like IT Support, L&D or Finance
Ensure that processes are accurately documented and described
Deployment and testing of new functionality and further system implementations or integration projects to further develop and enhance Adjust’s use of Workday and related systems (i.e. Greenhouse, Okta, Intellum, Jira)
Manage process and system related projects and initiatives, including change management 
Collaborate with internal stakeholders to define business requirements and translate them into actionable items from the systems perspective
Review, assess and recommend improvements to HRIS workflows and processes, user experience, innovative solutions, policy changes and/or major variations from established policies resulting into automation
Maintain knowledge of current trends in system requirements, releases and other HR technologies to enhance and improve efficiency in HR operations and service to employees

 
Bring Your Knowledge/ Experience & Qualifications: 
Must haves:

Multiple years of HRIS experience (any tools)
Experience in process documentation
Very good understanding of HR functional areas, practices, reporting needs and data analysis
Very good knowledge of HR process flows, automation and simplification potential and interfaces inside of the People team and with its stakeholders
Strong attention to detail paired with the ability to work well independently and under pressure
Experience working cross-functionally with different stakeholders with a high responsiveness to business needs
Strong organizational skills, a structured work manner and ability to balance multiple daily tasks and long-term strategic projects
Excellent business acumen and sovereignty to communicate succinctly and professionally within and outside of the organization

Nice to have:

Practical Workday experience is a plus
Knowledge of process modeling methods is a plus

 
Enhance Your Experience / Perks & Benefits:

Opportunity to make an impact on the ad-tech industry working for a forward-thinking leader in the space
International, diverse teams with a strong focus on transparency, feedback and fun
Education opportunities for ongoing professional development & continuous learning
Company onboarding program where you’ll learn the ins-and-outs of our product with your fellow newbies
Flexible workplace policy, allowing you to work either from home or our office space 
Generous vacation policy with flexible vacation days
Childcare program (Berlin only), paid parental leave
Additional private health insurance
Company Pension Plan with 40% employer contribution
English & German classes to enhance your collaboration with global colleagues and friends
Discounted Gym Membership with Urban Sports Club
Free annual BVG transportation ticket
Wellbeing support with qualified therapists
WFH program with remote online events (workouts, coffee chats, team events, games, etc.)
Relocation package and visa assistance for you and your family

 More details about our company culture and perks can be found on our career page.
Interested?  Let's Talk! 
 

 
We understand that imposter syndrome may sometimes hinder exceptional candidates from applying. So, don't hold back—apply with confidence! We're excited to hear from you and can't wait to chat!
 

 
Equal opportunity employer
Adjust is proud to be an equal opportunity employer. We champion a diverse and inclusive culture in all of our offices around the globe. We understand that all candidates are individuals with unique backgrounds and talents. At Adjust, we assess candidates on qualifications, merit and business needs. We do not discriminate based upon race, color, ancestry, religion, sex, national origin, sexual orientation, age, citizenship, marital status, disability, gender identity, veteran status or other applicable legally protected characteristics. If you see a position that excites you, please apply! We would love to have you join us in our mission to build a global tech company where we're all proud to belong to.
#LI-HYBRID
